duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive sourcing strategies to establish supplier partnerships and optimize category management.
Lead negotiations with suppliers, leveraging data-driven insights to maximize financial deliverables and minimize risk.
Manage end-to-end supply chain support, including contract compliance, issue escalation, and continuous sourcing improvements.
Build and strengthen internal and external relationships, driving accountability for supplier performance and KPIs.
Participate in the development of policies and procedures to achieve specific sourcing goals, and mentor less experienced colleagues.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business preferred or equivalent work experience (Master's preferred)
